column3: Godafre has a tall favor to ask of you.
Deliver the jhammel hides to Godafre.
Ah, my tight-lipped friend! Retrieving that tobacco for me really helped me out, but I have another favor to ask if you're willing...
You know what a jhammel is, don't you? Tall leaf-eaters? Long necks? Look around, and you can probably spot one now.
They seem docile enough, aye, but a kick from one of those massive legs will send most ordinary folk sailing into the nether-realm. And I consider myself fairly ordinary.
You, on the other hand, seem the type who can shrug off a hoof or two to the face. Do you think you could take down some of those towering beastkin, and gather me three of their hides...?
Head westward, and you'll soon come across the jhammels' grazing grounds. Three of their huge hides should be enough to get me started...
Didn't get yourself trampled, then? Let's have a look at what you've brought...
Ah, now these are some high-quality hides. Once I've cleaned and cured them, I can craft them into armor for the Resistance troops.

When I wasn't busy lugging things around, the Garleans would send me to the factory and make me sew their unnatural fibers into uniforms. Now, at least, I can put those skills to use for my countrymen instead.
Thanks to you, I'm almost ready to stand on my own two feet. You'll still be in town for a little while yet, won't you...?
